amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy account by $100 million and reduce the Nuclear Energy account by $50 million and the Fossil Energy Research and Development account by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy account by $100 million and reduce the Nuclear Energy account by $50 million and the Fossil Energy Research and Development account by $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 266 (Roll no. 541).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 266 (Roll no. 541).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Markey.
